Tooting My Own Horn

Published: 2009-12-14

So I got an email today from mobify.me. I use them to make the mobile friendly version of my site. Turns out they have a design gallery and mine was selected for entry. Go check it out, and if you’re looking for a mobile solution for your website, check out mobify.me’s services.
